title: 256: Embodying Your Inner Witch Archetype with Mia Magik
itunes:title: 256: Embodying Your Inner Witch Archetype with Mia Magik
description:
Many of us are remembering the sacred witch within, which translates to the wise women. We are reclaiming your magic, awakening our codes and stepping into our fullness, without the societal expectations that held us back. In this episode, modern day witch Mia Magik dives deep into embodying your inner witch and I share my story of being essentially burned at the stake when I was 10.

Mia will be an expert guest in Rose Gold Goddesses. Join the community that supports you on your spiritual journey, Rose Gold Goddesses. We are the sacred sisterhood collective honoring the goddess within, with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Get 20% off your Anima Mundi Herbals at animamundiherbals.com with coupon code "sahara"

Get 15% off your Beekeepers Naturals order at beekeepersnaturals.com/sahara with coupon code "sahara" at checkout

Get your Soul CBD Bath Bombs and Tinctures for 20% off over at mysoulcbd.com with code “sahara

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books

No other use, including, without limitation, reproduction, retransmission or editing, of this Podcast may be made without the prior written permission of the Sahara Rose, which may be requested by contacting pr@iamsahararose.com.

This podcast is for educational purposes only. The host claims no responsibility to any person or entity for any liability, loss, or damage caused or alleged to be caused directly or indirectly as a result of the use, application, or interpretation of the information presented herein.
